title: Last chance for this $20 Sam’s Club membership deal
description: Macworld If you’re stocking up for summer BBQs, road trip snacks, or just trying to cut down on weekly grocery bills, Sam’s Club can be a lifesaver. And right now, your first year of Club membership could be just $20 if you act fast. It’s the lowest price we’ve ever seen, but you only have through tomorrow, July 13, to grab this deal before it disappears. Think about it: Who wouldn’t want to buy mountains of snacks, enough toilet paper to build a fort (okay, maybe not), and TVs bigger than your average apartment window? Plus, you could score deals on everything from groceries to electronics, which means more money in your pocket for, well, whatever you want. But here’s the real kicker: A Sam’s Club membership also unlocks discounts on travel, entertainment, and movie tickets. So, basically, your $20 membership fee is working overtime to earn itself back in a dozen different ways. You have until July 13 at 11:59 p.m. PT to grab this $20 Sam’s Club membership deal (reg. $50). No coupon is needed to save 60%. 1-Year Sam’s Club Membership with Auto-RenewSee Deal StackSocial prices subject to change.
excerpt: Get a full year of access to warehouse savings, fuel discounts, and everyday essentials for 60% less through July 13

html:
Image: StackCommerce

If you’re stocking up for summer BBQs, road trip snacks, or just trying to cut down on weekly grocery bills, Sam’s Club can be a lifesaver. And right now, your first year of Club membership could be just $20 if you act fast. It’s the lowest price we’ve ever seen, but you only have through tomorrow, July 13, to grab this deal before it disappears.

Think about it: Who wouldn’t want to buy mountains of snacks, enough toilet paper to build a fort (okay, maybe not), and TVs bigger than your average apartment window? Plus, you could score deals on everything from groceries to electronics, which means more money in your pocket for, well, whatever you want.

But here’s the real kicker: A Sam’s Club membership also unlocks discounts on travel, entertainment, and movie tickets. So, basically, your $20 membership fee is working overtime to earn itself back in a dozen different ways.

You have until July 13 at 11:59 p.m. PT to grab this $20 Sam’s Club membership deal (reg. $50). No coupon is needed to save 60%.

1-Year Sam’s Club Membership with Auto-RenewSee Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
